item.title: compiling a beta kernel in archlinux
item.description: You have a new laptop, you install ArchLinux on it and seems like some things are missing. This is currently the case for me: one missing feature was suspend, my laptop just seems to boot as if I turned off everything, my application is not persisted another is a fix for my headphone noise issue, just to name a few… One of the few things you can try is to install the latest beta kernel.
